ygData.subject: Re: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I can t confirm that, but I can confirm that Harmonic still can t outrun Shadowmen... (Which do not have SoN, according to certain guides). Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:52 AM 10/4/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>*snip*
>
>>I am the fasting moving thing in
>>Norrath save two things, bards higher than me and SoN.
>*snip*
>
>>Harmonic Distortion, 37th unchained melody.
>>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
>I thought that SoN was equal to a 35th lvl bard with MM battledrums?
>Or is this bad info?

Well, I can't confirm that, but I can confirm that Harmonic still can't
outrun Shadowmen... (Which do not have SoN, according to certain guides).


Talies the Wanderer
